title: All this Dead'eye BS
body: Let's see mhm Shen, eye, the lettering count on the champion names zed 3 etc, and the one thing in project yi's teaser, some/random samurai was their 2 short katanas related to Shen, zed was also their and there were petals

replies.body:
What? It's basically confirmed now dude. After the Zed teaser we predicted Sona, Garen and Vi, and so far we've been correct. We're only waiting on Vi and there's strong evidence she's on her way soon.

**Jhin - The Deadeye** is legit

All that crap about Shen and a random Samurai is BS though.

>we predicted Sona, Garen and Vi

No, no one predicted it, there is basically always stuff hidden in the code, and people that found the stuff in the code found the stuff for sona/garen/vi early.
That's just making a prediction with evidence, the best kind of prediction.
Here I thought I was smart

Oh so now people listen to the idea i had. Before it was Deadeye - (something) then unknown about Jhin for the first 2 days, i say something on all the boards, and its magically Jhin - Deadeye, am I actually being listened to o:

Yes but i found out what the meaning of all the champions being supposedly "shot" means also the meaning of Jhin and his/its purpose : http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/123Ipmup-jhin-deadeye-teaser-meanings-revealed (your Welcome)
